Item.value: Workflow for processing an Engineering Change Notice Revision. For R0.5 the ECN WFL finishes after Status 40 release is achieved on the solution items of the ECN (25.11.2022)
Task sets the ECN revision's Closure to Canceled, Maturity to Complete and Disposition to Disapproved. Requestor & Analyst are notified that the ECN was rejected.

WorkflowTemplate.name: Specialist: Review Implementation and decide Approve/Rework/Reject

Item.value:
Change Specialist audits the change to ensure processes followed and makes 1 of the following decisions
- Approve, to release Change - Reject, to cancel Change - Rework, to modify Change
Task verifies ECN solution items and their status

WorkflowTemplate.name: Analyst-Contributors: Execute Implementation Plan and proceed for Engineering Approval

Item.value: - Users create/modify Items/revs, according to plan - Analyst/Contributors attach Solution Items to ECN revision, and completes task when done - Upon task completion Solution Items added as additional workflow targets
Choose signoff team.

- Users create/modify Items/revs, according to plan - Analyst/Contributors attach Solution Items to ECN revision, and completes task when done - Send Solution Items for Engineering Approval - Upon task completion Solution Items added as additional workflow targets
The CIB (Change Implementation Board) participants on the ECN will review the Implementation Plan. The task sets Maturity to Reviewing.

CIB members evaluate the implementation plan and determine effectivity. - Write signoff comments - Approve - the ECN continues forward to execution - Reject - the Change Specialist will determine the intended disposition
Choose signoff team.
The Change Implementation Board (CIB) participant assignments are checked and if empty the Specialist is prompted to assign them.
Assign the Change Implementation Board (CIB) participants on the ECN revision. Complete task when assignment done.

WorkflowTemplate.name: Specialist: Develop Implementation Plan and Approve/Sent to CIB

Item.value: 1. Detail the Implementation Plan 2. Add additional ECRs if needed 3. Decide from below options: -Approve: This option approves the ECN for execution -CIB: This option sends the ECN to Change Implementation Board (Assign members to CIB before selecting this option)
Analyst assignment is checked and if empty the Specialist is asked to assign Analyst.
Assign an Analyst on the ECN revision. Complete task when assignment done.
Change Specialist 1 assignment is checked and if empty system will automatically send the assignment to Global Change Manager Pool
ECR assignment is checked and if empty the requestor is asked to assign governing ECR
ECR is mandatory for ECN. Please assign the governing ECR and click on complete
Task verifies mandatory ECR needed for ECN

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -source_task=Specialist: Develop Implementation Plan and Approve/Sent to CIB

WorkflowTemplate.name: Analyst: Please add solution item with Engineering Approval status

Item.value:
Below steps need to be completed before the ECN could sent for Specialist Review: - ECN needs to have atleast 1 Solution Item - Each Solution Items need to have Engineering Approval status
Please click on complete to implement the above steps.

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -source_task=Specialist: Develop Implementation Plan and Approve/Sent to CIB

UserValue.title: handler_argument
UserValue.value: -subject=CN Approved for execution of the implementation plan

Item.value: -Engineering Article Revision: Status SR5EngApproved -> SR5Status40 -Engineering Installation Location Revision: Status SR5EngApproved -> SR5Status40 -Non-ERP Article Revision: Status SR5EngApproved -> SR5Status40

WorkflowTemplate.name: System: Create Engineering Approval on SR5EngMajorAssy

Item.value: -Engineering Major Assembly Revision : Create 'SR5EngApproved' status

WorkflowTemplate.name: System: Approve ECN and notify Requestor & Analyst
